translated: It is just as you have said.

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Noble sons and daughters,

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smra bar byed pa de ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smra bar byed pa de ni /
translated: when on the eighth, fourteenth, and fifteenth days this perfection of wisdom is being taught in the presence of a gathering of gods,

original: bsod nams dpag tu med /🔽grangs med / bsam gyis mi khyab /🔽gzhal du med /
analyzed: bsod nams dpag tu med / grangs med / bsam gyis mi khyab / gzhal du med /
translated: will generate immeasurable,🔽incalculable, inconceivable,

original: brjod du med pa dag bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brjod du med pa dag bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: immeasurable,🔽and inexpressible merits.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: Subhūti, it is because this perfection of wisdom

original: rin po che yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rin po che yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is a jewel.

original: rab 'byor / de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la brten na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la brten na /
translated: Subhūti, relying on this jewel of the perfection of wisdom,

original: sems can dmyal ba las thar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba las thar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will be freed from the hells.

original: dud 'gro'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dud 'gro'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be freed from the animal realm.

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be freed from the world of Yama.

original: mi dbul po las thar par 'gyur ro //🔽rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi dbul po las thar par 'gyur ro // rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be freed from poverty.🔽One will be reborn in the great sāla tree-like royal families,🔽in the great sāla tree-like brahmin families,

original: khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and in the great sāla tree-like business families.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: they will be reborn among the gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: they will be reborn among the gods of the Śubha­kṛtsna realm.

original: shes rab @121b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: shes rab @121b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: This perfection of wisdom

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: generates the fruit of entering the stream.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: It generates the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, arhatship, individual enlightenment, and unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: 'di ltar / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: 'di ltar / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams rgya cher bstan te /
translated: it is because in this perfection of wisdom the ten wholesome actions are taught in detail,

original: de la brten nas rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang /
analyzed: de la brten nas rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang /
translated: “Based on that, there are those of the ruling class who are like great śāla trees, there are those of the brahmin class who are like great śāla trees, there are those of the householder class who are like great śāla trees,

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod pa dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams yod pa dang / tshangs ris dang /
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod pa dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams yod pa dang / tshangs ris dang /
translated: there are the gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm, the Trāyastriṃśa, Yāmā, Tuṣita, Nirmāṇarati, and Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin realms, and the Brahmakāyika gods,

original: tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams dang / shin tu mthong dang /
analyzed: tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams dang / shin tu mthong dang /
translated: the Brahmapurohita, Brahmapārṣadya, Parīttābha, Apramāṇābha, Ābhāsvara, Parīttaśubha, Apramāṇaśubha, Śubhakṛtsna, Bṛhatphala, Asaṃjñisattva, and Avṛha gods,

original: gya nom snang dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar @122a *//
analyzed: gya nom snang dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar @122a *//
translated: the gods of the sphere of infinite space, the gods of the sphere of infinite consciousness, the gods of the sphere of nothingness, and the gods of the sphere of neither perception nor nonperception exist,

original: 'gro ba'i lha rnams yod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod pa dang /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i lha rnams yod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod pa dang /
translated: and the fruit of entering the stream, the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, arhatship, individual enlightenment, and unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening exist,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam gtan bzhi yod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam gtan bzhi yod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang /
translated: In this perfection of wisdom the four concentrations exist, the four immeasurables exist, the four formless absorptions exist, the perfection of generosity exists, the perfection of ethical discipline,

original: brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang /
analyzed: brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang /
translated: the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom exist, the applications of mindfulness exist, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties,

original: stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams yod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid yod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa dang / stobs bcu yod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams yod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid yod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa dang / stobs bcu yod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
translated: the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the path exist, inner emptiness exists, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature exists, the ten powers exist, the four fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa'i phyir te /
translated: because the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, up to the knowledge of all aspects exist.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las de dag la sogs pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas na /🔽de'i phyir 'di lta ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las de dag la sogs pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas na / de'i phyir 'di lta ste /
translated: Because in this perfection of wisdom these dharmas and so on are taught in detail.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: Therefore, this perfection of wisdom

original: rin po che zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rin po che zhes bya'o //
translated: is called the precious perfection.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi @122b pha rol tu phyin pa la ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi @122b pha rol tu phyin pa la ni /
translated: Subhūti, in the perfection of wisdom

original: skye ba'am / 'gag pa'am /
analyzed: skye ba'am / 'gag pa'am /
translated: there is no dharma that arises or ceases,

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /🔽rnam par byang ba'am /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'am / rnam par byang ba'am /
translated: is defiled or purified,

original: yongs su bzung ba'am /🔽dor ba'i chos gang yang med do //
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba'am / dor ba'i chos gang yang med do //
translated: is taken up or put down.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?🔽Because in this perfection of wisdom

original: 'di ltar; gang dag skye ba'am /🔽'gag pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /🔽rnam par byang ba'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar; gang dag skye ba'am / 'gag pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am / rnam par byang ba'am /

original: yongs su bzung ba'am /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba'am /

original: 'dor bar bya ba'i chos de dag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dor bar bya ba'i chos de dag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because those dharmas that are to be rejected are non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni /🔽dge ba'am / mi dge ba'am /🔽zag pa dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni / dge ba'am / mi dge ba'am / zag pa dang bcas pa'am /
translated: Subhūti, in this precious perfection of wisdom

original: zag pa med pa'am /🔽kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'am / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am /
translated: there is no dharma that is wholesome or unwholesome,

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa'am /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pa'am /
translated: with outflows or without outflows,

original: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'am /
translated: with afflictions or without afflictions,

original: nyon mongs pa med pa'am /🔽'jig rten pa'am /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa med pa'am / 'jig rten pa'am /
translated: defiled or undefiled,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'am /🔽'dus byas sam /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'am / 'dus byas sam /
translated: mundane or supramundane,

original: 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med do //🔽rab 'byor; rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med do // rab 'byor; rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: conditioned or unconditioned that can be apprehended.

original: nor bu rin po che yin te /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che yin te /
translated: Subhūti, for this reason this perfection is a precious gem.

original: rab 'byor / pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de ni /

analyzed: chos gang gis kyang ma gos pa yin no //
translated: is not sullied by any dharma.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar; gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de /
analyzed: 'di ltar; gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de /
translated: Because that dharma by which it would be sullied

original: dmigs su med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dmigs su med pa'i phyir te /
translated: cannot be apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / des na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / des na /
translated: therefore,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni /
translated: this precious perfection

original: gos pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: gos pa med pa yin no //
translated: is unsoiled.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed /🔽de ltar rnam par rtog par yang mi byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed / de ltar rnam par rtog par yang mi byed /
translated: Subhūti, if bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not form such perceptions,🔽do not form such thoughts,

original: de ltar dmigs par yang mi byed /🔽de ltar @123a *//
analyzed: de ltar dmigs par yang mi byed / de ltar @123a *//
translated: do not form such reference points,🔽and

original: spros par yang mi byed na /
analyzed: spros par yang mi byed na /
translated: do not form such conceptual elaborations,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba yin te /
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom, cultivate the perfection of wisdom, and see the lord buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
translated: They go from buddhafield to buddhafield in order to honor, venerate, respect, and make offerings to the lord buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song nas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song nas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing /
translated: They go from buddha realm to buddha realm and bring sentient beings to full maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: and from buddhafield to buddhafield, they bring beings to maturity and purify a buddhafield.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: “Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom

original: chos gang yang thob par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: chos gang yang thob par byed pa ma yin /
translated: does not cause any dharma to be attained,

original: ston par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: ston par byed pa ma yin /
translated: does not cause it to be revealed,

original: 'dzin par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa ma yin /
translated: does not cause it to be grasped,

original: sbyin par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: sbyin par byed pa ma yin /
translated: does not cause it to be given,

original: skyed par byed pa ma yin; 'gog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa ma yin; 'gog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: does not cause it to be produced, does not cause it to cease,

original: kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin /🔽rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin / rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: does not cause it to be afflicted,🔽does not cause it to be purified,

original: 'grib par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'grib par byed pa ma yin /
translated: does not cause it to diminish,

original: 'phel bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phel bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: does not cause it to increase,

original: 'das pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'das pa'ang ma yin /
translated: is not past,

original: ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin /
translated: is not future,

original: da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: and is not present.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: “Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom

original: 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: does not cause one to transcend the desire realm,

original: gnas par byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: gnas par byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: it does not cause them to stay,

original: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: it does not cause them to transcend the form realm or the formless realm,🔽it does not cause them to stay,

original: gnas par byed pa'ang ma @123b yin; sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: gnas par byed pa'ang ma @123b yin; sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: it does not cause the perfection of generosity to be given,

original: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: it does not cause it to be discarded,

original: tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: it does not cause the perfections of discipline, patience, perseverance, concentration, and wisdom to be given,

original: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: it does not cause them to be discarded,

original: nang stong pa nyid sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: it does not cause inner emptiness to be given,

original: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: it does not cause it to be discarded,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nying stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nying stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: up to it does not cause the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature to be given,

original: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: it does not cause it to be discarded,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: it does not cause the applications of mindfulness to be given,

original: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: it does not cause them to be discarded,

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang; dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang; dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: In the same way, they do not give or take away the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, or the path.

original: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin; stobs bcu sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /🔽'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin; stobs bcu sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin / 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They do not give or take away the ten powers,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /🔽'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin / 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, or the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽They do not give or take away the result of stream enterer,🔽the result of once-returner,

original: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: the result of non-returner,🔽the state of a worthy one,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /🔽'dor bar byed @124a *//
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin / 'dor bar byed @124a *//
translated: nor does it give the fruit of once-returner, nor the fruit of non-returner, nor the fruit of arhatship, nor the state of a pratyekabuddha, nor the knowledge of all aspects.

original: pha'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: pha'ang ma yin no //
translated: It does not give or take away anything.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: This perfection of wisdom

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /🔽'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin / 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: does not give or take away the dharmas of a Buddha,

original: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /🔽'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin / 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: does not give or take away the dharmas of an ordinary person,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /🔽'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin / 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: does not give or take away the dharmas of a śrāvaka or pratyekabuddha,

original: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: does not give or take away the dharmas of a Buddha.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom

original: 'dus byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /🔽'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin no //🔽'dus ma byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin / 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin no // 'dus ma byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin /

original: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin na //
analyzed: 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin na //
translated: He does not give the uncompounded element, nor does he take away.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
translated: And why?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /
translated: Whether the Tathagatas arise or not,

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'di ni /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'di ni /

analyzed: gnas pa nyid de / de de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par thugs su chud de /
translated: remains just as it is.🔽The Tathagata has fully known it,🔽and having fully known it, he has taught it,

original: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ba dang / rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ba dang / rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de nas lha'i bu 'bum phrag rab tu mang po dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas ca co dang / ga zha @124b 'don cing /
translated: Then, many hundreds of thousands of gods assembled in the sky above, crying out and

original: lha'i me tog autpa la dang / padma dang / ku mu da dang / padma dkar po dang / mand'a ra ba dag gis gtor nas 'di skad du /
analyzed: lha'i me tog autpa la dang / padma dang / ku mu da dang / padma dkar po dang / mand'a ra ba dag gis gtor nas 'di skad du /

analyzed: aa la la dzambu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo //

original: zhes tshig tu'ang brjod do //
analyzed: zhes tshig tu'ang brjod do //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa na /
translated: When this perfection of wisdom was taught,

analyzed: de las lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Then the Lord said to the venerable Subhūti,

analyzed: rab 'byor / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /

original: chos gang yang 'jug par bya ba'am /
analyzed: chos gang yang 'jug par bya ba'am /
translated: No dharma is present in order to engage or

analyzed: ldog par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin pas / rab 'byor / 'di ni /

analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa'ang ma yin /

original: gcig pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor is it a first turning.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: of this perfection of wisdom, which is not present in order to engage or

analyzed: chos gang yang 'jug par bgyi'am / ldog par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang lags /
translated: disengage with any dharma?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: “Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //

analyzed: de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: Similarly, the perfections of meditative stability, perseverance, patience, morality, and generosity🔽are empty of the perfections of meditative stability, perseverance, patience, morality, and generosity.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //🔽nang stong pa nyid ni /🔽nang stong pa nyid @125a *//
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid ni / nang stong pa nyid @125a *//
translated: the perfection of generosity is empty of the perfection of generosity.🔽The emptiness of internal phenomena is

original: kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: kyis stong ngo //

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni /
translated: Up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are

analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness.

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ni /
translated: Similarly, the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and path

original: lam gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lam gyis stong ngo //
translated: are the emptiness of the path.

original: stobs bcu ni /
analyzed: stobs bcu ni /
translated: The ten powers are

original: stobs bcus stong ngo //
analyzed: stobs bcus stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of the ten powers.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni /
translated: The four fearlessnesses, four detailed and thorough knowledges, and eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni /

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo //

original: de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni /
translated: Similarly, the fruit of once-returner, the fruit of non-returner, the state of a worthy one, a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, and the knowledge of all aspects

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: are empty of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Lord,🔽this perfection of wisdom,

original: dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: this perfection of wisdom that is the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities,

original: che ba lags te /
analyzed: che ba lags te /
translated: is a great perfection.

original: chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la /
translated: All phenomena are empty of the intrinsic nature of all phenomena.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon @125b par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'ang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon @125b par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'ang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis
translated: and also the bodhisattva mahāsattvas, having relied on the perfection of wisdom, fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, but do not fully awaken to any dharma at all.

original: shing / chos kyi 'khor lo'ang bskor la chos gang yang 'jug par bgyid pa'am /
analyzed: shing / chos kyi 'khor lo'ang bskor la chos gang yang 'jug par bgyid pa'am /
translated: They turn the wheel of the Dharma, but there is no dharma that they engage or

original: ldog par bgyid pa'ang ma mchis te /
analyzed: ldog par bgyid pa'ang ma mchis te /
translated: disengage from.

original: chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba'ang ma mchis la /
analyzed: chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba'ang ma mchis la /
translated: There is no dharma that they see at all,

original: chos gang yang yongs su ma mthong ba'ang ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: chos gang yang yongs su ma mthong ba'ang ma mchis lags so //
translated: and there is no dharma that they do not see at all.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽'di ltar / gang 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / 'di ltar / gang 'jug pa'am /
translated: If you ask why,

original: ldog pa'i chos de dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: ldog pa'i chos de dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du ste /
translated: it is because the dharma that would engage or🔽disengage is not apprehended.

original: 'di ltar / chos thams cad gtan mngon par ma grub pa lags pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar / chos thams cad gtan mngon par ma grub pa lags pas /
translated: It is because all dharmas are utterly unproduced.

original: stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni /
translated: Emptiness

original: 'jug par bgyid pa'am /
analyzed: 'jug par bgyid pa'am /
translated: does not engage or🔽disengage.

original: ldog par bgyid pa ma lags la /🔽mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'ang 'jug par bgyid pa'am /
analyzed: ldog par bgyid pa ma lags la / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'ang 'jug par bgyid pa'am /
translated: nor do they turn away from them.🔽They do not engage with signlessness or wishlessness,🔽

original: ldog par bgyid pa ma lags so //
analyzed: ldog par bgyid pa ma lags so //
translated: nor does it cause one to engage with or turn away from signlessness and wishlessness.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,🔽this teaching, demonstration, description, designation, engagement, elucidation, analysis, mention, clarification,

original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / gdags pa dang / 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / smos pa dang / gsal bar bgyid pa dang /🔽yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / gdags pa dang / 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / smos pa dang / gsal bar bgyid pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di ni /
translated: and perfect demonstration of the perfection of wisdom

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa lags so //
translated: is a pure teaching of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de'ang sus kyang ma bstan /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de'ang sus kyang ma bstan /
translated: Moreover, this teaching of the perfection of wisdom has not been taught by anyone,

original: sus kyang ma bzung lags so //
analyzed: sus kyang ma bzung lags so //
translated: and it has not been grasped by anyone.

original: gang sus kyang ma bstan /🔽sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni /
analyzed: gang sus kyang ma bstan / sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni /
translated: That which has not been taught by anyone🔽and has not been grasped by anyone

original: sus kyang mngon sum du ma bgyis lags so //
analyzed: sus kyang mngon sum du ma bgyis lags so //
translated: has not been realized by anyone.

original: gang sus kyang ma bstan /
analyzed: gang sus kyang ma bstan /
translated: That which has not been taught by anyone,

original: sus kyang ma bzung /
analyzed: sus kyang ma bzung /
translated: has not been grasped by anyone,🔽and has not been realized by anyone

original: sus @126a *// kyang mngon sum du ma bgyis pa de la ni /
analyzed: sus @126a *// kyang mngon sum du ma bgyis pa de la ni /

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa su'ang ma mchis te /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa su'ang ma mchis te /
translated: In it there is no one at all who has passed into complete nirvāṇa.

original: chos bstan pa 'di la su'ang sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba'ang ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la su'ang sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba'ang ma mchis lags so //
translated: In this teaching of the Dharma there is no one who becomes a recipient of gifts.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las /🔽gnas med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las / gnas med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
translated: In the Perfection of Wisdom in Eighteen Thousand Lines

original: sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
translated: it is called “The Chapter on the Absence of a Basis.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Su­bhūti said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽'di lta ste /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / 'di lta ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni //
translated: “Blessed One,🔽this perfection of wisdom

original: ma mchis pa lags so //
analyzed: ma mchis pa lags so //
translated: is a non-existent perfection.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Blessed One replied,

original: rab 'byor / nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Subhūti, it is because space does not exist.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: ” Subhūti then said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: “Blessed One,🔽this perfection of wisdom

original: mnyam pa nyid lags so //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid lags so //
translated: is a perfection of sameness.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
